Package gbuild.button

Class GButtonWithText

  • java.lang.Object
    • gbuild.GComponent
      • gbuild.button.GButton
        • gbuild.button.GButtonWithText
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GButtonOption
    public class GButtonWithText
extends GButton

    Button with a text component

    This is the implementation of a button which contains a text component inside it

      • draw

        public void draw()
        Description copied from class: GComponent
        Draw component on the screen

        This method would drawn the component taking into account all the customization done before.

        It is important to notice that component would not be drawn if visible state is not true.

        Specified by:
        draw in class GComponent
        See Also:
        GComponent.isVisible()

      • setMode

        public boolean setMode​(int tmode)
        Deprecated.
        Specify the mode of the text contained at the button.Available values are MODEL and SHAPE

        Available values are MODEL and SHAPE, so the modification would not be done if the passed value is not one of these values

        For more information about text alignment, click here

        Parameters:
        tmode - text mode
        Returns:
        if mode was changed

        @Deprecated
public void setSize​(int size)
        Deprecated.
        Description copied from class: GButton
        Specify size for current button

        Since the shape of the button would be considered as a square, the dimension (w, h) would be equal

        Overrides:
